meanings.sent1: The idolators gathered at the temple to pray to their idols.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilization had many idolators who believed in multiple gods.
meanings.sent3: The idolators mistakenly thought the statue could grant wishes.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the idolators, the idols held the power of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The idolators' devotion to their idols was unwavering.

meanings.definition: Idolators: Those who engage in idolatry.
meanings.sent1: The idolators' actions angered the religious leaders.
meanings.sent2: Idolators from different cultures have varied beliefs and practices.
meanings.sent3: The idolators' obsession with idols seemed peculiar to outsiders.
meanings.sent4: The idolators' hearts were filled with false gods.
meanings.sent5: The idolators' rituals were a display of their faith in idols.
